thread.title: James Gunn, Zoe Saldana Investigate Gamora For Science
thread.title_full: James Gunn, Zoe Saldana Investigate Gamora For Science

author: Megan Peters
title: James Gunn, Zoe Saldana Investigate Gamora For Science

organizations.name: zoe saldana investigate gamora for science megan peters start

text:
James Gunn, Zoe Saldana Investigate Gamora For Science Megan Peters Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
When it comes to James Gunn , the director has a long history with social media that continues to keep fans enthralled. Whether he goes to Twitter or Facebook, Gunn is known for sharing behind-the-scenes teasers and answering fan questions with a forward bluntness. And, now, it looks like Gunn has roped in Zoe Saldana in his social media crusade because science. UP NEXT: Will Nova Ever Join The MCU? 
Over on Instagram, the director posted a photo of Saldana holding up what appears to be two fused grapes. The green fruits have prompted the actress to laugh, and you will find out why once you read the director’s caption. You can read the photo’s hilarious description below: 
“In addition to making movies together, and doing ADR, like we just did, @zoesaldana & I are also ALWAYS IN THE PURSUIT OF SCIENCE. And that is why, when we found these grapes shaped just like Gamora 's butt, we needed to share them with you. You're welcome.” 
Clearly, the duo’s investigation of Gamora’s butt is purely scientific. However, many fans are also paying close attention to another part of Gunn’s note. It looks like Saldana is back to work on Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 with her ADR work. Right now, it looks like the actress is just providing her vocal talents, so fans can continue to look forward to much-anticipated sequel. 
Set to the backdrop of ‘Awesome Mixtape #2,’ Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team’s adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill’s true parentage. Old foes become new allies and fan-favorite characters from the classic comics will come to our heroes’ aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand. 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 is written and directed by James Gunn (Slither). The film marks the return of the original Guardians, including Chris Pratt (Jurassic World) as Peter Quill/Star-Lord; Zoe Saldana (Star Trek Into Darkness) as Gamora; Dave Bautista (Spectre) as Drax; Vin Diesel (Furious 7) as the voice of Groot; Bradley Cooper (American Sniper) as the voice of Rocket; Michael Rooker (Jumper) as Yondu; Karen Gillan (The Big Short) as Nebula; and Sean Gunn (Gilmore Girls) as Kraglin. New cast members include Pom Klementieff (Oldboy), Elizabeth Debicki (The Great Gatsby, Everest), Chris Sullivan (The Knick, The Drop) and Kurt Russell (The Hateful Eight, The Thing). A photo posted by James Gunn (@jamesgunn) on Jan 18, 2017 at 9:10am PST 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 is scheduled to hit theaters on May 5, 2017. Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 2017 ComicBook Anticipated #20 Best-Rated Before Release Anticipated Rating
